fixed_skill.desc: Deal Curse damage to 1 foe equal to 142.5/151.8/161.1% of Attack. Inflict 2 Curse stacks on the foe.
fixed_skill.name: Demonic Decree

passive_skill.desc: Increase Curse damage by 12%. When defeating a foe with Despair, transfer Despair to a living foe.
passive_skill.name: Curse Boost: Enhanced

passive_skill.desc: Increase Curse damage by 16%. When defeating a foe with Despair, transfer Despair to a living foe.
passive_skill.name: Curse Boost: Superior

passive_skill.desc: Increase Curse damage by 20%. When defeating a foe with Despair, transfer Despair to a living foe.
passive_skill.name: Curse Boost: Ascended

passive_skill.desc: Increase Curse damage by 20%. When defeating a foe with Despair, transfer Despair to a living foe. When target foe has 5 or more debuffs, increase damage by 10% more.
passive_skill.name: Curse Boost: Ultimate

showtime_skill.desc: Deal Nuclear damage to all foes equal to 180.0%/192.6%/205.2% of Attack.
showtime_skill.name: Highlight
